attributes.action: Withdraw proposals to allow police to stop and question anyone in the UK, without idenitifiable cause
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This threatens a futher move away from the presumption of innocence which is the traditional and proper basis for policing by consent, add identity cards and we get the "Your papers please" demand familiar from War films about occupied Europe. It won't be just the attitude of minorities towards the police that suffers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
